nodes.text: Scamp's slacks first appeared as an item of light armor in the Massively multiplayer online roleplaying game Star Wars: The Old Republic published by BioWare in 2011. Players of the Smuggler class, the only class able to wear the slacks, began the game wearing the armor making it one of the weakest pieces of equipment in the game. Apart from starting with the armor or trading it from another player in the game there is no other way to obtain Scamp's slacks currently making it impossible for Imperial players to possess.
